category.description: Specifies the main category of the error, determining the broad area of issue.

context.description: An object containing context-specific information pertinent to the error.

id.description: The unique ID of the error instance.

links.description: An object containing links related to the error, such as documentation URLs or support contact pages.

message.description: A detailed message describing the error.

status.description: The HTTP status code associated with the error.

subCategory.description: Identifies the subcategory of the error, providing more specific context within the main category.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next set of results.

offset.description: The offset value indicating the starting point for the next set of results.

copyRows.description: Specifies whether to copy the rows during clone

isHubspotDefined.description: Indicates whether the table is defined by HubSpot.

newLabel.description: The new label for the cloned table

newName.description: The new name for the cloned table

email.description: The email address of the user.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

total.description: The total number of tables available in the collection.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

id.description: The ID of the row to be cloned.

name.description: The name for the cloned row.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the column was created.

createdByUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the column.

deleted.description: Indicates whether the column has been deleted.

options.description: Options to choose for select and multi-select columns

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the column was last updated.

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who last updated the column.

total.description: The total number of rows available in the collection.

type.description: Indicates the type of response, which is 'STREAMING' by default.

allowChildTables.description: Specifies whether child tables can be created

allowPublicApiAccess.description: Specifies whether the table can be read by public without authorization

columns.description: List of columns in the table

createdAt.description: Timestamp at which the table is created

deleted.description: Specifies whether the table is marked as deleted.

deletedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the table was deleted.

dynamicMetaTags.description: Specifies the key value pairs of the [metadata fields](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb#dynamic-pages) with the associated column IDs.

enableChildTablePages.description: Specifies creation of multi-level dynamic pages using child tables

isOrderedManually.description: Indicates whether the table rows are ordered manually.

published.description: Indicates whether the table is currently published.

publishedAt.description: Timestamp at which the table is published recently

rowCount.description: Number of rows in the table

updatedAt.description: Timestamp at which the table is updated recently

useForPages.description: Specifies whether the table can be used for creation of dynamic pages

completedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch processing was completed.

links.description: A collection of related links associated with the batch response.

requestedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch request was made.

startedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch processing began.

status.description: The current status of the batch operation, with possible values: CANCELED, COMPLETE, PENDING, PROCESSING.

id.description: Unique identifier for the foreign ID.

total.description: The total number of rows available in the collection.

type.description: Indicates the type of response, which is 'RANDOM_ACCESS' by default.

rowLimitExceeded.description: Specifies whether row limit exceeded during import

allowChildTables.description: Specifies whether child tables can be created

allowPublicApiAccess.description: Specifies whether the table can be read by public without authorization

columns.description: List of columns in the table

dynamicMetaTags.description: Specifies the key value pairs of the [metadata fields](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/cms/guides/dynamic-pages/hubdb#dynamic-pages) with the associated column IDs.

enableChildTablePages.description: Specifies creation of multi-level dynamic pages using child tables

useForPages.description: Specifies whether the table can be used for creation of dynamic pages

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

completedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch processing was completed.

links.description: A collection of related links associated with the batch response.

numErrors.description: The number of errors encountered during the batch operation.

requestedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch request was made.

startedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the batch processing began.

status.description: The current status of the batch operation, with possible values: CANCELED, COMPLETE, PENDING, PROCESSING.

foreignColumnId.description: The id of the column from another table to which the column refers/points to.

foreignTableId.description: The id of another table to which the column refers/points to.

maxNumberOfCharacters.description: Defines the maximum number of characters allowed in the column.

maxNumberOfOptions.description: Specifies the maximum number of options that can be set for select and multi-select columns.

options.description: Options to choose for select and multi-select columns

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

displayIndex.description: The index position for displaying the row within the table.

id.description: The id of the table row

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

before.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving previous pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the previous pages' results.

PreviousPage.description: specifies the paging information needed to retrieve the previous set of results in a paginated API response

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

createdAt.description: Timestamp at which the row is created

id.description: The id of the table row

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

publishedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the row was last published, in date-time format.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp at which the row is updated last time

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

displayIndex.description: The index position for displaying the row within the table.

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the option was created, in ISO 8601 format.

createdByUserId.description: The ID of the user who created the option.

id.description: The unique ID of the option.

label.description: A user-friendly label that identifies the option.

name.description: An internal name assigned to the option, distinct from the label.

order.description: The order in which the option appears, represented as an integer.

type.description: Indicates the category or data type of the option (e.g., string, number).

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the option was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

updatedByUserId.description: The ID of the user who last updated the option.

after.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next page results.

NextPage.description: Specifies the paging information needed to retrieve the next set of results in a paginated API response

scopes.hubdb: Read from and write to my HubDB
